thumb.name: Your Birthday
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's your birthday. Mark%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGlow in it.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Birthday Wish
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Your%3Cbr%3EBirthday.%3Cbr%3EStephanie.%3Cbr%3EBecause%3Cbr%3EYou're%3Cbr%3ESpecial%3Cbr%3Eto Me%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA birthday wish to tell you%3Cbr%3Ethat you mean so much to me.%3Cbr%3EFor you have that extra something%3Cbr%3Ethat I hardlly ever see %26#151;%3Cbr%3EIt's a warmth. an honest caring.%3Cbr%3Ethat draws others close to you%3Cbr%3EAnd makes you someone special%3Cbr%3Eevery day the whole year through!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Wonderful Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: #1 Birthday and Year
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMorgan.%3Cbr%3Ehope your%3Cbr%3E birthday's%3Cbr%3E#1%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd your year is filled%3Cbr%3Ewith friends and fun!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Make a Big Splash!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3Ehappy birthday%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMake a big splash%3Cbr%3Eon your birthday. Devon!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Celebrating You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAmanda.%3Cbr%3EI could never forget%3Cbr%3Ea friend like you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...or the day that%3Cbr%3Ecelebrates you%3Cbr%3Ecoming into this world.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Efrom Kate%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Best Birthday Ever
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'My best%3Cbr%3Ebirthday%3Cbr%3Ewould be%3Cbr%3Eif I could%3Cbr%3Ego to the%3Cbr%3Eamusement%3Cbr%3Epark and%3Cbr%3Estay there%3Cbr%3Efor my%3Cbr%3Ewhole life!'%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EAaron. Age 6%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENo matter how you spend it.%3Cbr%3ESharon.%3Cbr%3Ehope this is%3Cbr%3Eyour best Birthday ever!%3Cbr%3E
